meanings.definition: Read quickly or skim through a text to gain a general understanding.
meanings.sent1: She speedreads her favorite books to finish them faster.
meanings.sent2: He always speedreads the news articles to keep up with current events.
meanings.sent3: The student speedreads the textbook before the exam, hoping to absorb the key points.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes speedreads the pages like a race car zooming through a track.
meanings.sent5: Speedreading allows you to cover more material in less time.

meanings.definition: The act of reading quickly or skimming through a text.
meanings.sent1: His speedreads of the novel helped him write a summary for class.
meanings.sent2: Speedreads can be useful when you need to get an overview of a long document.
meanings.sent3: The library offers a speedreads session for those who want to finish books in a flash.
meanings.sent4: In the speedreads competition, she finished the book in record time.
meanings.sent5: The speedreads of the report revealed the main points quickly.
